title: "Slut!" (Taylor's Version) [From The Vault]
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:06.74] Flamingo pink, Sunrise Boulevard
[00:13.28] Clink, clink, being this young is art
[00:18.94] Aquamarine, moonlit swimming pool
[00:25.48] What if all I need is you?
[00:30.94] Got love-struck, went straight to my head
[00:33.84] Got lovesick all over my bed
[00:37.09] Love to think you'll never forget
[00:40.49] Handprints in wet cement
[00:43.45] Adorned with smoke on my clothes
[00:46.54] Lovelorn and nobody knows
[00:49.71] Love thorns all over this rose
[00:52.93] I'll pay the price, you won't
[00:55.76] But if I'm all dressed up
[00:58.85] They might as well be lookin' at us
[01:01.95] And if they call me a slut
[01:04.90] You know it might be worth it for once
[01:07.96] And if I'm gonna be drunk
[01:11.00] I might as well be drunk in love
[01:13.89] Send the code, he's waitin' there
[01:19.46] The sticks and stones they throw froze mid-air
[01:26.28] Everyone wants him, that was my crime
[01:29.47] The wrong place at the right time
[01:32.22] And I break down, then he's pullin' me in
[01:35.12] In a world of boys, he's a gentleman
[01:38.77] Got love-struck, went straight to my head (straight to my head)
[01:41.66] Got lovesick all over my bed (over my bed)
[01:44.84] Love to think you'll never forget
[01:48.26] We'll pay the price, I guess
[01:51.21] But if I'm all dressed up (if I'm all dressed up)
[01:54.16] They might as well be lookin' at us (lookin' at us)
[01:57.58] And if they call me a slut (if they call me a slut)
[02:00.46] You know it might be worth it for once (worth it for once)
[02:03.75] And if I'm gonna be drunk
[02:06.63] I might as well be drunk in love
[02:09.45] Half asleep, takin' your time
[02:12.00] In the tangerine, neon light, this is luxury
[02:17.08] You're not sayin' you're in love with me
[02:20.34] But you're going to
[02:21.79] Half awake, takin' your chance
[02:24.33] It's a big mistake, I said, "It might blow up in your pretty face"
[02:29.39] I'm not saying, "Do it anyway" (do it anyway)
[02:32.71] But you're going to (oh)
[02:35.61] 
[02:40.46] And if they call me a slut!
[02:43.45] You know it might be worth it for once
[02:46.56] And if I'm gonna be drunk!
[02:49.72] I might as well be drunk in love
[02:52.38]
